cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IT. 

The paper focuses on face recognition, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The approach proposed involves learning discriminative linear transformations, which is a machine learning technique (cs.LG). The optimization criteria used in the approach is based on matrix rank, which is a mathematical concept commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the potential of the approach for feature extraction, which is a topic in multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper mentions the potential application of the approach in coded aperture design, which is related to information theory (cs.IT).
